blog.name: stanathanxoox
blog.title: STANathanXOox - Fanfiction
blog.description: You'll find reader insert fics for NCIS, NCIS LA, NCIS NOLA, Rizzoli and Isles, Harry Potter, Forever, Brooklyn 99, The Good Place, Castle, Fantastic Beasts and Where To Find Them, One Day At A Time, The Princess Diaries and Glee. Imagines/ requests/ prompts are open.  FULL MASTERLIST

title: From Across The Room
body:
gif is mine


@harryxhermioneisharmony requested: Sharing a soft smile across a crowded room with Harry


Today was one of those days were you dreaded being an Auror. After losing one of your own tragically by a misfired spell during a case, from the enemy, of course, you were all gathered to attend the funeral of your fallen comrade. Listening to the tributes from the family and friends, the words said by your team leader and then a couple of words from the head of the Auror department the funeral was drawn to a close and you were all invited to stay behind to offer the family and friends, to remember the man who had been a big part of your team. However, after weeks of being away from your fiance due to his own mission, you were wanting nothing more than to be at home wrapped up in his arms, relishing the time you could spend together. At the moment, however, you were having to make do with stolen glances at him from across the room, as it was, every time either of you tried to make your towards the other, one of you would be stopped by someone else. Zoning out of the conversation that you had been dragged into by one of your teammates you look up across the room and note that Harry is watching you, you can’t help but chuckle breathlessly at the blush that rises on his cheeks before he sends you a soft smile from where he is standing next to one of his best friends Ronald Weasley. You smile back at him before you say, manage to excuse yourself, not letting anyone stop you from where you wanted to be. Harry seemed to notice this too and rushed towards you as well, greeting you halfway across the room where he winds his arms around your waist, pulling you closer towards him before he whispers

“I hope no one thinks bad of me for stealing this moment with you Y/N, it’s been far too long since I was able to hold you close and kiss you”. You rest your forehead on his as you whisper

“I don’t care what anyone thinks Harry, just please kiss me,” you say and he smiles before he captures your lips in the most tender of kisses. You sigh when he breaks the kiss but you understand why, taking his hand the two of you make the rest of your rounds before you take your leave. Finally heading home and getting to spend some time together.


Tag List: @tiva-jenry-caskett-rizzles-densi, @jimmybpride, @dressed-up-just-like-z1ggy, @nikkiwierden, @samchelforever007, @kirkspockbones, @xoncisxncislaxncisnolaox, @lasalle-pride-sebastian-love, @haliannej, @brooklyn-99-amyxjake , @mizzezm

Imagines/ requests/ prompts are open.  FULL MASTERLIST

title: Dumb Joke
body:
gif is mine


@harryxhermioneisharmony requested: Telling them a dumb joke just to see their smile with Harry


You hated to see Y/N so sad, it physically made you hurt to see her in such turmoil. You were doing as much as you could, knowing how much she detested showing any sign of weakness in front of anyone, even you were someone she usually tried to hide the deeper emotions from. You were sitting next to her on the couch, knowing the devastating news that she had received from the muggle doctor was literally tearing her apart inside and all you could do was sit here and try and reassure her that everything would turn out alright in the end. As the hours passed and the more time was spent sitting on this uncomfortable couch in the depressingly barren hospital family room you think of Y/N’s smile and how you would do anything to see that smile light up her face, to hear her lilting laugh filled the room, because God knows at this moment you missed it so much. You remember a joke that Ron had told you a couple of weeks ago and how at the time it had made you roll your eyes and had caused Hermione to hit him in the shoulder but you were beginning to feel a little bit desperate and knowing out of everyone she would probably laugh the most, so turning to her you say

“Y/N, what’s a witch’s favourite subject in school?” she turns to you and raises an eyebrow before asking

“I don’t know Harry,” she says, voice raspy and raw from crying so much

“Spelling,” you say and she cracks a small smile before you hear that perfect laugh that warms your heart so much. Placing a kiss on her cheek you smile

“It’s good to see you smile babe”. She sighs before turning and nuzzling into your side

“Thank you Harry” she whispers against your neck.


Tag List: @tiva-jenry-caskett-rizzles-densi, @jimmybpride, @dressed-up-just-like-z1ggy, @nikkiwierden, @samchelforever007, @kirkspockbones, @xoncisxncislaxncisnolaox, @lasalle-pride-sebastian-love, @haliannej, @brooklyn-99-amyxjake , @mizzezm

Imagines/ requests/ prompts are open.  FULL MASTERLIST

title: I’m So Glad You’re Okay
body:
gif is mine


@harryxhermioneisharmony requested: Giving them a tight hug that makes them lose their breath with Hermione


She had been so scared, hearing that her girlfriend had been captured by a couple of death eaters who were angry with the wizarding world and golden trio for ending the reign of their master. Knowing that Y/N had been kidnapped had freaked Hermione out, to the point where she was beginning to panic. She had been reassured by the aurors that they were sending their best people out ot search for the death eaters and Y/N, but as the hours passed Hermione’s mind began to race to places, thoughts that she didn’t even want to acknowledge began to swarm through her mind and she felt like breaking down. That is until she hears her name being called out, it’s familiar and her head jolts up

“Harry,” she says, running up to her best friend and holding him as she finally breaks down, letting all the emotion from the last couple of hours free.

“Ssh, its ok Hermione, Y/N will be here with you again soon,” he says, trying his hardest to reassure you but you shake your head

“How can you know that Harry?” you hiccup

“Because I know the auror team and I know Y/N. Your girlfirend is one of the strongest people I know Hermione, she will be fine” he says and you take a calming breath

“Your right,” you say and he nods giving you a gentle squeeze

“Of course I am,” he says with a slight smirk, you shake your head pushing him gently.


Harry is with you for the rest of the afternoon, he holds you close as the two of you wait for news. He tells you stories about his training and talks about spending afternoons in Diagon Alley helping out George and Ron in the store, rekindling his relationship with Ginny after the war and Weasley dinners on a Sunday evening. Though most of the time you and Y/N tried to attend those dinners recentely due to work the two of you hadn’t been able to attend as much as you would’ve liked. You sit next to Harry, head leaning against his shoulder, eyes squeezed tightly shut, his hand squeezing yours gently before he says

“Look Hermione”, you open your eyes and follow your gaze in the direction that Harry is pointing. You squeal, letting go of his hands as you race towards your girlfriend who is being escorted towards you by a couple of aurors. Her arms are open wide and she readily accepts your hug, you squeeze her tight, not willing to let her go ever again. When she begins rasping for air, you loosen your grip ever so slightly before you lean down and kiss her lips.

“I’m so glad your ok Y/N” you whisper resting your forehead against hers, she pecks your cheek and smiles

“I’m doing a lot better now that I’m outta that place, Hermione”.

reblog.comment:
gif is mine


@harryxhermioneisharmony requested: Giving them a tight hug that makes them lose their breath with Hermione


She had been so scared, hearing that her girlfriend had been captured by a couple of death eaters who were angry with the wizarding world and golden trio for ending the reign of their master. Knowing that Y/N had been kidnapped had freaked Hermione out, to the point where she was beginning to panic. She had been reassured by the aurors that they were sending their best people out ot search for the death eaters and Y/N, but as the hours passed Hermione’s mind began to race to places, thoughts that she didn’t even want to acknowledge began to swarm through her mind and she felt like breaking down. That is until she hears her name being called out, it’s familiar and her head jolts up

“Harry,” she says, running up to her best friend and holding him as she finally breaks down, letting all the emotion from the last couple of hours free.

“Ssh, its ok Hermione, Y/N will be here with you again soon,” he says, trying his hardest to reassure you but you shake your head

“How can you know that Harry?” you hiccup

“Because I know the auror team and I know Y/N. Your girlfirend is one of the strongest people I know Hermione, she will be fine” he says and you take a calming breath

“Your right,” you say and he nods giving you a gentle squeeze

“Of course I am,” he says with a slight smirk, you shake your head pushing him gently.


Harry is with you for the rest of the afternoon, he holds you close as the two of you wait for news. He tells you stories about his training and talks about spending afternoons in Diagon Alley helping out George and Ron in the store, rekindling his relationship with Ginny after the war and Weasley dinners on a Sunday evening. Though most of the time you and Y/N tried to attend those dinners recentely due to work the two of you hadn’t been able to attend as much as you would’ve liked. You sit next to Harry, head leaning against his shoulder, eyes squeezed tightly shut, his hand squeezing yours gently before he says

“Look Hermione”, you open your eyes and follow your gaze in the direction that Harry is pointing. You squeal, letting go of his hands as you race towards your girlfriend who is being escorted towards you by a couple of aurors. Her arms are open wide and she readily accepts your hug, you squeeze her tight, not willing to let her go ever again. When she begins rasping for air, you loosen your grip ever so slightly before you lean down and kiss her lips.

“I’m so glad your ok Y/N” you whisper resting your forehead against hers, she pecks your cheek and smiles

“I’m doing a lot better now that I’m outta that place, Hermione”.
